mapper.update: update tt_order set status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, delivery_fee = #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=REAL}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_on = #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_no = #{deliveryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_company = #{deliveryCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ORDER_ID, status, price, delivery_fee, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by, delivery_no, delivery_company from tt_order where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ORDER_ID, status, price, delivery_fee, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by, delivery_no, delivery_company from tt_order
